title: Book and Sword 4 [China Version]
description:
-Continuation of the Book and Sword.  Once in a lifetime torrent.



 Book and Sword - Gratitude and Revenge (2002)

 Language - Mandarin
 Subtitle - Traditional Chinese


 -Starring - Chiu Man Cheuk, Esther Kwan, Ray Lui Leung Wai, Cheng Pei Pei, Aaron Chen, Rachel Ngan


 A sprawling tale set in the Ching Dynasty , during which the rebellious Red Flower Society , led by their charismatic chief Chan Gar-lok (Chiu Man Cheuk) , attempts to assassinate the Ching Emperor Qian Lung (Aaron Chen) . As Chan and his fellow fighters organize to carry out their objective , a shocking discovery leads to a fierce showdown and Chan is forced into exile to the Western frontier , where he meets the legendary Princess Fragrance (Rachel Ngan) . Together with the Nomads , Chan executes a daring return to the capital and an audacious plan to capture Qian Lung once and for all.
